description.english: You met Leyala.
description.french: Vous avez rencontré Leyala.
description.spanish: Has conocido a Leyala.
description.russian: Вы встретили Лейалу.

description.english: You had your first sexual encounter with Leyala.
description.french: Vous avez eu vos premiers rapports sexuels avec Leyala.
description.spanish: Has tenido tu primer encuentro sexual con Leyala.
description.schinese: 你第一次和莱亚拉亲热
description.russian: У вас был первый сексуальный опыт с Лейалой.

description.english: You condemned Lucius' actions.
description.french: Vous avez réprouvé les actes de Lucius.
description.spanish: Has condenado las acciones de Lucius.
description.schinese: 你谴责了卢修斯的行为
description.russian: Вы осудили действия Люциуса.

description.english: You forgave Lucius' actions.
description.french: Vous avez pardonné les actions de Lucius.
description.spanish: Has perdonado las acciones de Lucius
description.schinese: 你原谅了卢修斯的行为
description.russian: Вы простили действия Люциуса.

description.english: You stopped Laureen before taking it too far.
description.french: Vous avez mis le holà avec Laureen avant que les choses aillent trop loin.
description.spanish: Detuviste a Laureen antes de ir demasiado lejos.
description.schinese: 你在劳琳采取进一步行动之前阻止了她
description.russian: Вы остановили Лорин, пока она не зашла слишком далеко.

description.english: You probably took it too far with Laureen.
description.french: Vous avez probablement été trop loin avec Laureen.
description.spanish: Probablemente te pasaste de la raya con Laureen.
description.schinese: 你也许和劳琳做得太过火了
description.russian: Вы, вероятно зашли слишком далеко с Лорин.

description.english: You ripped out Dan's tongue.
description.french: Vous avez arraché la langue de Dan.
description.spanish: Le arrancaste la lengua a Dan.
description.russian: Вы вырвали Дэну язык.

description.english: You had sex for the first time with Leyala.
description.french: Vous avez pénétré Leyala pour la première fois.
description.spanish: Tuviste sexo por primera vez con Leyala
description.schinese: 你第一次和莱亚拉交媾
description.russian: У вас был первый секс с Лейалой.

description.english: You played a spicy pool game.
description.french: Vous avez joué une partie de billard torride
description.spanish: Jugasteis una partida de billar picante.
description.schinese: 你玩了一盘火辣性感的桌球游戏
description.russian: Вы сыграли в сексуальный бильярд.

description.english: You decided to take Leyala to meet Kerros.
description.french: Vous êtes allé rencontrer Kerros avec Leyala.
description.spanish: Has decidido llevar a Leyala a conocer a Kerros.
description.schinese: 你决定带莱亚拉去见克罗斯。
description.russian: Вы решили взять Лейалу на встречу с Керросом.

description.english: You engaged in a sexual act during a council meeting.
description.french: Vous vous êtes adonné à un acte sexuel au cours d'une réunion du Conseil.
description.spanish: Has realizado un acto sexual durante una reunión del consejo.
description.schinese: 你在会议期间进行了亲昵举动。
description.russian: Вы участвовали в сексуальном акте во время заседания совета.

description.english: Leyala enjoyed some orange juice.
description.french: Leyala a pris un jus d'orange.
description.spanish: Leyala disfrutó de un zumo de naranja.
description.russian: Лейала наслаждалась апельсиновым соком.

description.english: You interrogated Alessandro.
description.french: Vous avez interrogé Alessandro.
description.spanish: Has interrogado a Alessandro.
description.russian: Вы допрашивали Алессандро.

description.english: You opened up about Odysseus.
description.french: Vous vous êtes ouvert au sujet d'Ulysse.
description.spanish: Te abriste sobre Odiseo.
description.schinese: 你坦诚了奥德修斯的事情
description.russian: Вы рассказали об Одиссее.

description.english: You had a sexual encounter with Tasha.
description.french: Vous avez eu vos premiers rapports sexuels avec Tasha.
description.spanish: Tuviste un encuentro sexual con Tasha.
description.russian: У вас был сексуальный контакт с Ташей.

description.english: You had a threesome with Leyala and Tasha.
description.french: Vous avez fait un plan à trois avec Leyala et Tasha.
description.spanish: Hiciste un trío con Leyala y Tasha.
description.russian: У вас был секс втроем, с Лейалой и Ташей.

description.russian: Вы включили Кали и Найю, в свои отношения с Лейалой.

description.russian: Ты сам решил стать наставником Найи.

description.english: You completed all chapters available during the First Realm - Terran.

description.english: You expressed concern about Lucius' state.

description.english: You decided that Yuki would continue calling you Master.

description.english: You achieved the most hostile outcome during the night-time conversation with Lucius.
